definitions: (in the context of Japanese popular culture) the quality in a fictional female character of being youthfully innocent and vulnerable in an idealized way, perceived as eliciting feelings of affection or protectiveness

examples.text: I am an enthusiast of anime and have watched series where moe is a selling point
most moe characters are deliberately unrealistic teenage girls

shortDefinitions: (in Japanese popular culture) quality in female character of being youthfully innocent and vulnerable
